long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please note that this extension functions as part of a learning environment and a companion to browser.astrosafe.co Please contact hello@astrosafe.co if you are interested!

AstroSafe creates a safe internet browser for learning environments. 

Educators can enable their curious students to learn, discover, and explore online by creating focused learning environments. ASTRO has built-in content blocking to make the internet a safer space with less distractions.

Educators are equipped with the tools to manage their students digital education. They can monitor their students activity in real-time & historically, and are given the tools to keep their students away from harmful content, whilst they learn and discover online.

Students can learn in the focused learning environments created by educators. They are presented a safe interface where they can explore the  online content within a lesson, but not beyond it. Students also have a search engine which they can use to safely learn beyond their lessons.

Privacy policy: https://www.astrosafe.co/app/privacy-policy
